text: The women's 100 metres at the 2015 Asian Athletics Championships was held on the 3 and 4 of June. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text- align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold||Chisato Fukushima |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver||Viktoriya Zyabkina |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze||Wei Yongli |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 in each heat (Q) and the next 4 fastest (q) advanced to the semifinals.
